price: Kuma da waɗansu waɗanda* aka jinkirtar ga umurnin Allah, kõ dai Ya yi musu azãba kõ kuma Ya karɓi tũba a kansu. Kuma Allah ne Masani, Mai hikima.
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
footnotes: * Wata ƙungiya wadda ita ba munãfuka ba ce, amma kuma ba su fita zuwa yãƙin ba, kuma bã su da wani dalĩli sai kasãla kawai da taushewar Shaiɗan. Waɗannan an jinkirtar da al'amarinsu har Allah Ya yi hukunci a kansu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
